definitions: synthetic resin or plastic consisting of polyvinyl chloride or a related polymer, used for wallpapers and other covering materials and for records

examples.text: light-reflecting vinyls can be hung in the usual way

shortDefinitions: resin or plastic used for gramophone records

definitions: vinyl used as the standard material for records

examples.text: fans had to wait almost a year before the song eventually appeared on vinyl

shortDefinitions: vinyl used as material for records

examples.text: he had plenty of tapes and vinyls

definitions: of or denoting the unsaturated hydrocarbon radical —CH=CH₂, derived from ethylene by removal of a hydrogen atom
shortDefinitions: of unsaturated hydrocarbon radical derived from ethylene by removal of hydrogen atom
